summary: An idealistic young Haitian travels to rural Quebec to intern for an independent Member of Parliament when a national debate erupts that finds the MP holding the tie-breaking vote.
cast: Irdens Exantus|Caroline Trudel|Patrick Huard|Clémence Dufresne-Deslières|Dangelo Néard|Philona Jean|Ketlain Difficile|Joyce Kistabish|Jacqueline Michel|Emmanuelle Kistabish McDougall|Richard Kistabish|Robin Aubert|Émilie Villeneuve|Alexandre Castonguay|Sonia Cordeau|Eric St. Laurent|Micheline Lanctôt|Suzanne Clément|Jules Philip|Paul Doucet|Marie-Claude Lavallée|Marie-Eve Perron|Amy Donovan|Alexis Martin|Marc Lemay|Jean-François Leblanc|Martine Bellisle|Ellen David|Laurent Guesley|Paul Ahmarani|Neil Kroetsch|Shayne Brazeau|Barry Blake|Michelle LeBlanc|Fanfare Cemuchca|Sam Chamas|Mel Guibz|Claude Huard|Caren MacNevin|Mardy Men
title: Guibord s'en va-t-en guerre
